data.OPTION-D: Because her mother understands her situation.

data.STORY: Lily just gets a haircut. The hairdresser cuts too much hair, and she looks silly. At school, Lily's friends laugh at her and tell her she looks like a hedgehog. Lily tries to pretend she doesn't care.
data.QUESTION: Why does Lily seem happy on the surface?
data.OPTION-A: Because she receives a lot of compliments
data.OPTION-B: Because she is satisfied with the haircut
data.OPTION-C: Because she likes hedgehogs very much
data.OPTION-D: Because she wants to stop classmates from laughing

data.OPTION-B: Because her mother agrees to her attending the party
data.OPTION-C: To avoid her mother not letting her attend the party
data.OPTION-D: Because her mother understands her situation.

data.OPTION-D: Because the break is too short

data.OPTION-C: Because she does not want to start a conflict
data.OPTION-D: Because she is afraid the bully gets hurt

data.STORY: Zhou Yu wants to go out, but he feels stomachache. He knows, if he tells his mother he has a stomachache, his mother says he cannot go out. He tries to hide his feelings, letting his mother let him go out of the house.
data.QUESTION: How does Zhou Yu appear when this happens?

data.STORY: Zhou Yu wants to go out, but he feels stomachache. He knows, if he tells his mother he has a stomachache, his mother says he cannot go out. He tries to hide his feelings, letting his mother let him go out of the house.
data.QUESTION: Why does Zhou Yu appear to be happy?
data.OPTION-A: Because he does not want his mother to know he has a stomachache
data.OPTION-B: Because his mother agrees he can go out
data.OPTION-C: In order not to make his mother worry
data.OPTION-D: Because he does not care about the stomachache
